channel.title: particles.xyz on particl3s.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in particles.xyz on particl3s.xyz

item.title: Battery
item.description: Bought a used solar cell, small and portable. Also saw a dead rodent earlier, under a bridge.

item.title: Slice of Life
item.description: User interface is sorely off in much of open source, same with backwards compatibility. Jamming a Snes cartridge into a n64.

item.title: Candles
item.description: Since electric outages are starting to happen there’s a bunch of candles about the house here. First world problems, getting supplies and stuff.

item.title: Gingerbread Fingers
item.description: Took a walk through a forest, saw almost no one. Scrounging about town for bakeries and dessert.

item.title: The Earth Blushes in Flowers
item.description: Flower was an awesome video game.

item.title: Wear Sun Screen!
item.description: Since Summer is about to begin the ceremony is in. It’ll be a once in a lifetime opportunity, city streets are best not get isolated in.

item.title: Onion Skins Have Pigment
item.description: The machinery has been overheating a lot, good thing there’s an internal thermometer. It usually taps out at around 70 degrees celsius. Let’s paint some eggs!

item.title: Bzzt
item.description: Looking into alternative tech providers, spring cleaning!

item.title: Chlorophyll
item.description: Attempted homemade nutella with peanuts, cocoa powder and honey once. Bad idea, thumbs up for culinary disasters.

item.title: Seasons
item.description: Waking up to a foot of snow, untouched without visitors in the night. The end of winter is bitter and sweet since the animals are about and cold blistering hollow no more.

item.title: Workaholism
item.description: X-mas celebrations are coming to a close & waking up from a long hangover. Yes, it is January 31st and it’s dawning on everyone that life has to go on.

item.title: Logic
item.description: Completed a 1st logic network & almost ready to step into a new sculpture.
Happy New Year!

item.title: CC-0
item.description: Updated licensing info on music 4 videos.

item.title: Avalanche
item.description: If not for the absence of snow right now would be a-ok. Making deformations on a primate.

item.title: Acme
item.description: Comments have been removed on account of making website ugly.
Comms are up.

item.title: Test Phase Sum Up
item.description: Map clear, Starship launch at the ready.

item.title: Reference
item.description: From now on this here subset in recess has dedication outlined to keeping up to date on personal projects, w.i.ps and so on.
